EmailTemplate.name: less than 24mths submission
EmailTemplate.subject: less than 24mths submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
PhD
As we are in process of STUDENT NAME's (STUDENT ID) thesis submission we note she is submitting less then 24 months of her candidature, under our policy a minimum of 24 months of her candidature is require before she can submit her thesis. Since she is submitting less then 24 months of her candidature the Steering Committee require a support letter from you in support of her early submission. Once completed please email us the letter by reply to this email?
Master's
As we are in process of STUDENT NAME's (STUDENT ID) thesis submission we note she is submitting less then 12 months of her candidature, under our policy a minimum of 12 months of her candidature is require before she can submit her thesis. Since she is submitting less then 12 months of her candidature the Steering Committee require a support letter from you in support of her early submission. Once completed please email us the letter by reply to this email? _______________________ ​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
